list_definition.definition: a person who flies an aeroplane/airplane

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The pilot and crew were all killed in the air crash.

list_definition.definition: a person who directs a ship in and out of a harbour/harbor, river, or coastal waters.

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: a pilot scheme (= one done on a small scale, eg to solve certain problems before a larger, more expensive project is started).
